content: this intermediate-level pattern features a seamless one-piece construction worked from the bottom up in the round the design includes eye-catching stripes and a unique colorwork technique creating a visually appealing finished product with clear written instructions and video tutorials crocheters of all skill levels can enjoy creating this versatile tote **unique features-** seamless one-piece construction eye-catching stripes versatile and stylish design **materials needed-** hook 5mm us size 8 0 yarn lb collection cotton bamboo https //shareasale com/r cfm b=1026079&u=704992&m=72611&urllink=www%2elionbrand%2ecom%2flb%2dcollection%2dcotton%2dbamboo%2dyarn%2ehtml&afftrack= dk weight 620 yards
